notice.ch: 須先修物理化學(熱力學)

remark.ch: 須先修物理化學(熱力學)

goal.ch: 本門課目標為使學生了解異相催化的基本知識，其中包含反應進行時的表面化學、動力學、以及合成異相觸媒的材料化學等概念。了解基本觀念後，學生將學習異相催化如何被應用於永續減碳技術的研發，例如生物質與二氧化碳的轉化。
goal.en: The goal of this course is to learn the fundamental concepts of heterogeneous catalysis, including principles of surface chemistry, reaction kinetics, and materials chemistry for the synthesis of solid catalytic materials. After understanding these basic concepts, students will learn how heterogeneous catalysis is currently being used in the development of sustainable technologies, such as the conversion of biomass and carbon dioxide.

outline.ch:
每週上課三小時
第 1 週：異相催化的發展史與基本概念
第 2 週：氣體吸附現象與朗繆耳模型
第 3 週：異相催化反應的熱力學與動力學(I)
第 4 週：異相催化反應的熱力學與動力學(II)
第 5 週：異相觸媒的合成方法(I)
第 6 週：異相觸媒的合成方法(II)
第 7 週：期中考
第 8 週：異相觸媒的鑑定技術(I)
第 9 週：異相觸媒的鑑定技術(II)
第 10 週：異相催化反應器簡介
第 11 週：異相催化中的質量與熱傳遞
第 12 週：化學工業中重要的異相催化反應
第 13 週：費-托合成、生物質簡介
第 14 週：生物質衍生糖類之高值化
第 15 週：異相催化在二氧化碳轉化的應用(I)
第 16 週：異相催化在二氧化碳轉化的應用(II)/學生口頭報告
第 17 週：學生口頭報告
第 18 週：期末考
outline.en:
Three hours weekly
Week 1: Concepts and development of heterogeneous catalysis
Week 2: Gas adsorption and Langmuir adsorption model
Week 3: The thermodynamics and kinetics of heterogeneous catalysis (I)
Week 4: The thermodynamics and kinetics of heterogeneous catalysis (II)
Week 5: Syntheses of heterogeneous catalyst (I)
Week 6: Syntheses of heterogeneous catalyst (II)
Week 7: Mid-term Exam
Week 8: Characterizations of heterogeneous catalyst (I)
Week 9: Characterizations of heterogeneous catalyst (II)
Week 10: Introduction of catalytic reactors
Week 11: Mass transfer and heat transfer of heterogeneous catalytic reactions
Week 12: Processes using heterogeneous catalyst in chemical industry
Week 13: Fischer–Tropsch synthesis and introduction of biomass
Week 14: Valorization of biomass-derived sugars
Week 15: Heterogeneous catalysis for CO2 conversion (I)
Week 16: Heterogeneous catalysis for CO2 conversion (II)
Week 17: Student presentation
Week 18: Student presentation / Final exam

textbook.ch:
1. Heterogeneous Catalysis：Fundamentals and Applications, Julian R.H. Ross. (Elsevier, 2012).
2. Synthesis of Solid Catalysts, Krijn de Jong. (Wiley, 2009).
3. Spectroscopy in catalysis, J. W. Niemantsverdriet. (Wiley, 2007)
4. Self-prepared handouts and slides.
textbook.en:
1. Heterogeneous Catalysis：Fundamentals and Applications, Julian R.H. Ross. (Elsevier, 2012).
2. Synthesis of Solid Catalysts, Krijn de Jong. (Wiley, 2009).
3. Spectroscopy in catalysis, J. W. Niemantsverdriet. (Wiley, 2007)
4. Self-prepared handouts and slides.

gradMethod.en: Homework(10％), Midterm(30％), Final Exam(40％) and Final Report(30％)

flexDiscription.ch: 學生在學期初會被分成數個小組，每組在17或18週將針對一主題進行口頭報告(30-40分鐘，包含問與答)。主題將為課程中部分內容的延伸，如特定的反應與概念的深入探討。此彈性教學的目的為培養學生蒐集與整理文獻的能力以及訓練簡報技巧。組員們也能在準備過程中學習團隊合作。在簡報後的問答與討論則可培養學生批判思考的能力。
flexDiscription.en: Students will team up at the beginning of the semester. Each team is required to give an oral presentation (30-40 min, including Q&A) on a specific topic in week 17 or 18. The topic will be subjects extended from the contents covered in the lectures, such as in-depth discussions of specific reactions and concepts.
